name: Noodle Granny
description:
This was created for the Weekly Gam Jam (week 156), the theme being "noodle".

Your noodles are the thing of legend amongst those who know you. To provide for your family, you open up a food stand and fire up the wok. However, people are reluctant to try eating at a place with no history or reputation, preferring the comfort and conventions of their chain stores.

You will have to find a way to win the people over. You're convinced if they just try your noodles once, they'll be hooked. 

How To Play

You will need to click on passerbys to entice them over to your noodle stall to eat. 

When you've successfully attracted a customer, you need to decide what to cook for them from the available ingredients, which will effect the value of the meal, but also the time taken to cook it.

If a meal is not finished before the day is done, you will not be credited for it!
